document_data.name: Wong Fei Hung
document_data.mainbody:
'''Wong Fei Hung''' was a Shou-ling [[monk]] of the [[Path of Enlightenment]] in [[Kara-Tur]].

It was said that [[Chan Cheng]], a god of war in [[Kara-Tur]], one of the [[Nine Immortals]], once descended to earth in the form of a [[dragon]] and challenged Wong Fei. The two battled each other for three days and three nights, and in the end Chan Cheng was so impressed by Wong Fei's skill that he gave him [[Wong Fei's ioun stone|a special ''ioun stone'']].

The stone remained with Wong Fei until he died, then disappeared.
